thought: To craft an acacia_trapdoor, I need to place 6 acacia_planks in the crafting grid in a 2x3 pattern. I will start by moving the first acacia_planks from slot 40 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1
